text:
Yummy home cooked food, generous portions!
Yusheng is awesome, fresh ingredients, homemade sauce which is refreshing and delicious, and definitely not stingy with the abalone and salmon slices!
Every visit brings me surprises, will always return for more!
The food is delicious like a home cook food. They are generous with the food portion. The decoration of the restaurant is unique.
I highly recommend everyone to drop by this restaurant, the environment is surprisingly homely, comfortable and friendly. Changed menu daily.
Good vibes over here! Seasonal dishes, unique private experience.
No comment on the food and service but a bit pricy. Two of us spent $85.00 dining in and the most expensive dish is Pork Knuckle at $58.
